attributes.additional_details: It’s not fair on any person/animal! People are scared and so is our animals! We need to stop fireworks! People’s animals go missing and run off when they’re on! We shouldn’t have to lock our animals away when fireworks are on. It’s not fair. Us people who don’t like the fireworks shouldn’t have to hide either!!! We need to get fireworks banned!!!!
attributes.background: I want the government to BAN fireworks! It’s not fair on our animals/people!! A lot of people are scared of fireworks and it’s destroying them! Our animals are petrified and it’s not fair! I want fireworks to be banned.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599738
